messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: :Our military presence is inadequate in your sector. We need you to construct BSA-50 Artillery position aboard your station. Base parts are available for shipping via cargo. -Nanotrasen Naval Command

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Good morning crew,it is nice to hear you are settling well into your shift and upon noticing so i will be hosting a a part at my hotel shuttle with au suit rooms a huge kitchen,lounge and spa so if you dont want to miss out on a one time oppertunity like this head to the bar for telleportation by yours truely the captain

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Gravity Generator Room.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Supply Department

Cargo: Seems we've ordered doubles of our department resupply packages this month. Can we send them to you?

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheric anomalies detected. Temporary telecommunication failure imminent. Please contact you*%fj00)`5vc-BZZT
